content: free pattern is available as a video tutorial 1 on my blog crochet kit available 2 this pocket duck pattern is beginner friendly and quick to work up it s also a no-sew pattern meaning it s worked completely in one piece this bird can be kept as a squishy plush with a super bulky blanket or chenille velvet yarn it can also be turned into a small keychain size with thinner weight yarns and a smaller hook crochet a family of duckies of varying sizes by using different weights of yarn play with different yarn colors to make a mallard duck or use one solid yellow to create a rubber ducky this miniature duckling is great as a good luck charm birthday gift christmas or holiday gift as party favors or market and craft fair products they make adorable baby shower gifts decor for nursery rooms or even crib mobile attachments kids and adults alike will adore this cute stuffed animal amigurumi toy **size** height 3 5 9 cm **materials** hobbii baby snuggle super bulky 6 yarn in
